title: Background note For internal EP use only
snippet: Alexei Navalny is a Russian politician, lawyer, founder of the Anti-Corruption Foundation and · leader of the political party “Russia of the Future”. In September 2013, he ran in the Moscow · mayoral election from the RPR-Parnas party.

title: Parnas Party Envisions Navalny, Khodorkovsky as Future Leaders
snippet: Kasyanov told reporters during the convention that though Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny and prominent former oil tycoon-turned-activist Mikhail Khodorkovsky were not yet members of the party, that may soon change.

title: RPR-PARNAS to insist Navalny refuses from radical nationalism, left course - Russia - TASS
snippet: /ITAR-TASS/. RPR-PARNAS (Republican Party of Russia – People’s Freedom Party) will suggest Alexei Navalny refuses from radical nationalism and left course, the opposing party’s co-chair Boris Nemtsov told Itar-Tass commenting on the ...

title: People's Freedom Party (Russia) - Wikipedia
